verses.roman:
punaḥ mālā diyā svarūpādi nija-gaṇa
āgu bāḍi' pāṭhāila śacīra nandana

synonyms: punaḥ—again; mālā—garlands; diyā—offering; svarūpa-ādi—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī and others; nija-gaṇa—personal associates; āgu bāḍi'-going forward; pāṭhāila—sent; śacīra nandana—the son of mother Śacī.
translation: Then, for the second time, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu sent garlands through Svarūpa Dāmodara and other personal associates. Thus they went forward, sent by the son of mother Śacī.
